mapper.update: update module set modulename = #{modulename}, moduleurl = #{moduleurl}, parentid = #{parentid}, fcode = #{fcode}, levels = ${levels}, orders = ${orders}, moduletype = ${moduletype}, alias = #{alias}, parentalias = #{parentalias}, updateDate = now() where moduleid = #{moduleid}
mapper.delete: update module set delflag = 1,updateDate = now() where moduleid = #{moduleid}
mapper.select: SELECT moduleid,modulename,moduleurl,parentid,levels,mark,alias from module where delflag = 0 ORDER BY levels asc

SELECT moduleid,modulename,moduleurl,parentid,levels,orders,mark,alias,parentalias from module where 1=1
AND moduleid in(SELECT moduleid from role_module WHERE roleid = #{roleid})
AND delflag = 0 ORDER BY levels asc
